Reviews.Title: WRONG PHONE
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: In the pictures, it shows a Htc touch pro 2 EUROPEAN phone. This means that it is not verizon, at&t;, sprint, alltel, or T-mobile. it just says HTC on it, and it is chrome. They sent me a brown and gold t-mobile version with out a second camera on it. This one is awful. I was very excited to get this phone, and paid alot for it. And they sent me the wrong one.

Reviews.Title: seller cheated me...there is no second camera in this phone
Reviews.Author: dk
Reviews.Content: Initially I dint notice that my phone is not having second camera. Seller has mentioned model number as T7373 and when I explored on internet I found that T7373 has second camera for video calls, even the product's picture also show a second camera. But there is no second camera, this is very big feature missing. Seller should paste original picture of their product.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: T. Nomessi
Reviews.Content: Great phone and the shipping was much faster than expected.  The seller sent extra accessories for which I am grateful.  Love the product and so many apps were already loaded.Excellent buy from Amazon

Reviews.Title: poor communications with the seller
Reviews.Author: c_feltnr
Reviews.Content: I believe I was sent a refurb phone and not a new one.  It stopped working in a couple of weeks.  I contacted the seller and was given a RMA#.  When looking through the box I discovered a postage free TMobile bag.  The bag was to small to put the box in it.  So once again I contacted the seller.  I was told to put the phone and the charger in the box with a note and drop it in the mail.  I did this, but the seller claims he never received the phone.  After a couple of months my a-z claim was denied by Amazon because I could not provide a return tracking number.  However, Amazon did give me a 100% refund, called a good will refund.  They looked at all the emails between myself and the seller and realized I did what they told me to do,so of course there was no return tracking number. Thank God for the honesty and good will of Amazon or I would have been out over $260.  As for the seller, I think he did get this phone back only not from me.  I think the bag I put the phone in was to the seller they bought the phone from.  I also think the original seller sent this phone back to them to be refurbed and once again be resold.

Reviews.Title: No es lo que esperaba..
Reviews.Author: Hernan
Reviews.Content: En general el telefono no es tan malo, lo que pasa es que la batería no dura nada, (si lo usas bastante te puede durar 12 hs con suerte) después es muy grande y pesado.. el touch no es de lo mejor ya que a veces no responde o hay que presionar con mucha fuerza, la calidad del aparato en cuanto a la construcción es muy buena, el sonido es fuerte. El wifi funciona bien, no es una maravilla pero cunmple la función. El gps tambien funciona correctamente pero cuando el celular se pone en reposo, tanto el wifi como el gps pierden la conección. Tiene muy poca memoria ram, por lo que si tenes muchas cosas abiertas se relentiza demasiado y hay que resetearlo.. en síntesis no lo recomendaría. Vale destacar que el teclado qwerty es de lo mejor pero no alcanza con eso si el equipo es lento y no dura nada su bateria. Por último la camara es muy mala y sin flash.

Reviews.Title: Save your MONEY!
Reviews.Author: Angy
Reviews.Content: Trust me save your money and go get a samsung galaxy or an iphone. I bought this phone a year ago and it's totally crap! the Camera isn't clear and, the phone freezes almost all the time!!! I hate the fact that I've gotten it for just a year and I have to get a new phone!

Reviews.Title: HTC touch pro
Reviews.Author: llllcn
Reviews.Content: Good phone, it's what I was expecting..perfomance very good. Amazon delivery the best I received in 5 days in New Zealand.

Reviews.Title: wondering
Reviews.Author: irene
Reviews.Content: please peoplei just got this HTC phone wondering if i can use it in Nigeria(MTN) because it seems not to be seeing the network/serviceSomeone please help

Reviews.Title: very good smartphone regardless of  being an older model
Reviews.Author: zkkorpio
Reviews.Content: this phone is well constructed and heavy, I bought it because of the reviews on the speakerphone featureand it is loud enough to be heard across the room .the voice recognition dialing is very accurate and fastbeing this a 2 year old model it is still functional and very useful (and it is not that "behind" when compared to the latest phones)I'm happy with it and plan on keep in it for as long as I can.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: ann pulido
Reviews.Content: La mercancia es de excelente calidad, y llego a tiempo segun lo establecido en el sistema. Lo recomiendo 100 %... Venezuela

Reviews.Title: Pretty good phone.
Reviews.Author: Sara
Reviews.Content: This is quite a decent phone. I bought it because I needed a new phone since my LG Optimus pooped out, and this phone worked fine for me. A good texting phone; also has a memo pad that you can actually WRITE on with a stylus. The phone comes preloaded with Facebook, and Youtube app. It also has Microsoft Word, Excel, and Powerpoint on it. A media player, AND you can connect it to your laptop and make it an internet source for your laptop by plugging in the USB charger.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: this is a really good phone, now they need to make it windows phone 7 to complete it on gsm band.

Reviews.Title: I love this phone
Reviews.Author: IT_Guy
Reviews.Content: I bought the phone for myself since it seemed to be on the heavy side, but my wife fell in love with it, so i'm phoneless again after 3 days. oh well guess i'll have to buy myself another.no complaints....excellent shipping & delivery timeexcellent phoneCDMA & GSM5 stars

Reviews.Title: bad sound quality
Reviews.Author: isa
Reviews.Content: This phone has the worst sound quality ever, i can barely hear the person I am talking to even after turning the volume all the way up. Freezes up constanly and have to turn if off to get to work again. The keyboard is wonderful since for those who love texting; but i do not recomend this phone.

Reviews.Title: Excelent.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have been using for 3 months without problems, full 3g, camera, internet, etcit works and looks very fine

Reviews.Title: HTC pro 2
Reviews.Author: Weng Chan
Reviews.Content: the phone works correctly in concordance with the specifications that describe the seller and the manufacturer's website, the only problem I see is that the seller does not specify that this phone is marked with T-Mobile logo in addition to this color phone is coffee which does not correspond to the images of the seller or is in the rest especificacioines why he's a star rating in general is a good phone I was given before the time of delivery and functioning properly.

Reviews.Title: OKAY phone
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey
Reviews.Content: This phone is okay, windows 6.5 mobile has fixed several bugs from 6.1 Only problem with this phone is when you want to call somebody you have to tinker around the menus. This phone is not for someone who wants a simple phone, this phone is complicated, and advanced.The major star downer is the price. This phone may cause $400 - $500 USD.
